name: Ancient VR coaster
description: Ancient VR Coaster will take you on your very own private roller-coaster, an unique experience!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer, 32-64-bit Processor: I5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970 , equivalent or newer Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: default sound device Additional Notes: HTC vive required , Oculus DK2 or CV1 required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer, 32-64-bit Processor: I7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTXGTX970 , equivalent or newer Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: default sound device Additional Notes: HTC vive required , Oculus DK2 or CV1 required

reviews.review_text: This is a nice coaster with some nice particle and light effects, it is the first one that is available for the Vive! The developer is very responsive and fixed the problem I had with the track disappearing in less than 1 hour. It is perfect for parties and seeing people having a lot of fun when they try this ride, one of the first things I will show to family and friends in the future.  I like to support the VR devs in these early days of VR they spend their time in creating stuff for us without earning much!
